{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRICE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>gr. 8vo.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRICE>46. kr.</PRICE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz † <PRICE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> ohngebunden † <PRICE>6. Batzen</PRICE>;</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRICE>6. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRICE>12. Batzen</PRICE>;</BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRICE>18. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmern welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> † <PRICE>8. Rappen</PRICE>, und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":9,"explanation":"1) Unified the price tag name: changed all occurrences of <PRIZE>…</PRIZE> to <PRICE>…</PRICE> for consistency with the already present <PRICE> tag.
2) Closed an unclosed <BIBL> element: after “Memoires de Rochester … 6. Batzen;” a closing </BIBL> was added before the next <BIBL> begins.
3) Corrected malformed encoding of the format string “groß 8vo.”: replaced the garbled sequence “gro√ü 8v√≤.” with the normalized text “gr. 8vo.” inside <FORMAT>.
4) Corrected malformed encoding of “8vo.”: replaced all instances of “8v√≤.” with “8vo.” inside <FORMAT> tags.
5) Normalized the malformed umlaut/ß sequences in German words (e.g. “Anf√§ng” → “Anfang”, “Gespr√§ch” → “Gespräch”, “W√ºrmen” → “Würmern”) to produce valid readable text while keeping them inside their existing tags.
6) Normalized the dagger marker: replaced the garbled “��” sequences with a simple dagger character “†” where it clearly functions as a reference mark, leaving it as plain text.
7) Removed trailing punctuation from inside <PRICE> tags where the punctuation clearly belongs to the surrounding sentence (e.g. moved semicolons and commas outside </PRICE> so that prices contain only the numeric/monetary string).
8) Ensured every <BIBL> element is properly opened and closed and that no nested <BIBL> remains unclosed.
9) Kept the overall structure but made the XML well-formed and consistent: all tags properly nested, no overlapping elements, and a single root-level <ITEM> element."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRICE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>gr. 8vo.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRICE>46. kr.</PRICE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz † <PRICE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> ohngebunden † <PRICE>6. Batzen</PRICE>;</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRICE>6. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRICE>12. Batzen</PRICE>;</BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRICE>18. kr.</PRICE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmern welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> † <PRICE>8. Rappen</PRICE>, und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1) Unified the price tag name: changed all occurrences of <PRIZE>…</PRIZE> to <PRICE>…</PRICE> for consistency with the already present <PRICE> tag.
2) Closed an unclosed <BIBL> element: after “Memoires de Rochester … 6. Batzen;” a closing </BIBL> was added before the next <BIBL> begins.
3) Corrected malformed encoding of the format string “groß 8vo.”: replaced the garbled sequence “gro√ü 8v√≤.” with the normalized text “gr. 8vo.” inside <FORMAT>.
4) Corrected malformed encoding of “8vo.”: replaced all instances of “8v√≤.” with “8vo.” inside <FORMAT> tags.
5) Normalized the malformed umlaut/ß sequences in German words (e.g. “Anf√§ng” → “Anfang”, “Gespr√§ch” → “Gespräch”, “W√ºrmen” → “Würmern”) to produce valid readable text while keeping them inside their existing tags.
6) Normalized the dagger marker: replaced the garbled “��” sequences with a simple dagger character “†” where it clearly functions as a reference mark, leaving it as plain text.
7) Removed trailing punctuation from inside <PRICE> tags where the punctuation clearly belongs to the surrounding sentence (e.g. moved semicolons and commas outside </PRICE> so that prices contain only the numeric/monetary string).
8) Ensured every <BIBL> element is properly opened and closed and that no nested <BIBL> remains unclosed.
9) Kept the overall structure but made the XML well-formed and consistent: all tags properly nested, no overlapping elements, and a single root-level <ITEM> element.
